languages.text: Убедил{mf||а} Паскаля оставить богохульный ксенотех в своей плоти.
Convinced Pasqal to leave the profane xenotech inside his body.
languages.original_text: Убедил{mf||а} Паскаля оставить богохульный ксенотех в своей плоти.

languages.text: 你说服了帕斯卡，让他将亵渎神明的异形科技造物留在体内。
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to leave the profane xenotech inside his body.

traits.locale_text: 你说服了帕斯卡，让他将亵渎神明的异形科技造物留在体内。

languages.text: Pasqal überzeugt, die profane Xenotech in seinem Körper zu belassen.
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to leave the profane xenotech inside his body.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal überzeugt, die profane Xenotech in seinem Körper zu belassen.

languages.text: Vous avez convaincu Pasqal de laisser la xénotechnologie profane dans son corps.
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to leave the profane xenotech inside his body.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez convaincu Pasqal de laisser la xénotech profane dans son corps.

languages.text: Has convencido a Pasqal para que deje la xenotecnología profana en su cuerpo.
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to leave the profane xenotech inside his body.

traits.locale_text: Has convencido a Pasqal para que deje la xenotecnología profana en su cuerpo.

languages.text: パスカルの体内にある冒涜的な異星技術を残すよう説得した。
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to leave the profane xenotech inside his body.

traits.locale_text: パスカルの体内にある冒涜的な異星技術を残すよう説得した。

languages.text: Pasqal'ı, kâfir zeno teknolojisini vücudunda bırakmaya ikna ettin.
languages.original_text: Convinced Pasqal to leave the profane xenotech inside his body.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal'ı kâfir zeno teknolojisini vücudunda bırakmaya ikna ettin.
